elements.description: Navigator through object with treelike datastructure.

properties.name: tree
properties.description: The main node structure

properties.name: dataPlane
properties.description: The currently displayed node list

properties.name: _renderedLevel
properties.description: Nodes (children) to be displayed when opening a node

properties.name: _openNodePath
properties.description: The path of the opened node

properties.name: _nodesOnOpenNodePath
properties.description: The nodes on the path of the opened node

properties.name: selectedNode
properties.description: The selected node

properties.name: nodePath
properties.description:
The path of the selected node
This is the node which was highlighted and after the user tapped the select button

properties.name: nodesOnNodePath
properties.description: The nodes on the path of the selected node

properties.name: highlightedNode
properties.description:
The highlighted (focused) node
This is the node which is currently selected in the list

properties.name: highlightedNodePath
properties.description: The path string of highlighted (focused) node

properties.name: searchValue
properties.description: The search string

properties.name: _search
properties.description: Whether a search should be executed

properties.name: searchPlaceholder
properties.description: Placeholder for search field.

properties.name: searchGlobalPlaceholder
properties.description:
Text displayed when local search has finished
to suggest a search on the entire tree

properties.name: searchMinLength
properties.description: Minimum length of searchValue to trigger a search

methods.description: Convenience method for `gettext`

methods.name: gettext
methods.description:
#### Basic functionality ##### `_(string, t)`
{{ _(‘My translation’, t) }}
#### Interpolation ##### `_(string, [args], t)`
{{ _(‘Hello {0}’, user.name, t) }}

methods.name: ngettext
methods.description:
#### Plurals ##### `ngettext(singular, plural, count, t)`
{{ ngettext(‘My translation’, ‘My translations’, count, t) }}
#### Plurals with interpolation ##### `ngettext(singular, plural, [count and other args], t)`
{{ ngettext(‘My translation for “{1}”’, ‘My {0} translations for “{1}”’, count, ‘hello’, t) }}
_The first number-argument found will be used as ‘count’ to decide plural._

methods.name: pgettext
methods.description:
#### Context ##### `pgettext(context, ‘text’, t)`
{{ pgettext(‘Cancel Invoice’, ‘Cancel’, t) }}
#### Context with interpolation ##### `pgettext(context, ‘text’, [args], t)`
{{ pgettext(‘Cancel Invoice’, ‘Cancel {0}’, document.type, t) }}

methods.name: npgettext
methods.description:
#### Plurals and context ##### `npgettext(context, singular, plural, count, t)`
{{ npgettext('Cancel invoice', ‘My cancellation’, ‘My {0} cancellations’, count, t) }}
#### Plurals and context with interpolation ##### `npgettext(context, singular, plural, count, t)`
{{ npgettext('Cancel invoice', ‘My {1} cancellation’, ‘My {0} {1} cancellations’, count, document.type, t) }}

methods.name: focus
methods.description: Focusses the search input.

methods.name: _computeDataPlane
methods.description: Returns the found nodes based on a search string and a given tree to be searched

params.name: searching
params.description: If true, a search should be executed

params.name: renderedLevel
params.description: The node list on which the search should be executed

methods.name: _renderLevel
methods.description:
Returns a node array with the children of a node on the given path
If the node doesn't have children, the node gets returned

params.name: pathLocator
params.description: The separated address parts of a node

methods.name: _normalizeNodes
methods.description:
Normalizes and returns an Array of nodes
with the properties name, path, sectionName, children

methods.name: _getNode
methods.description:
Returns a node based on a given path locator.
If pathLocator is empty or not defined, null gets returned.

params.name: pathLocator
params.description: The separated address parts of a node

methods.name: _getTreePathParts
methods.description: Returns the nodes on a path specified by a given path locator

params.name: pathLocator
params.description: The separated address parts of a node

return.desc: The found nodes or empty array

methods.name: _clearSearch
methods.description: Clears the search input

methods.name: _getNodeName
methods.description: Returns the name of a given node

methods.name: _highlightedNodeChanged
methods.description: Sets the highlightedNodePath when highlightedNode changed

methods.name: hasChildren
methods.description: Returns true if a given node has children

methods.name: openNode
methods.description: Opens a node (renderLevel) based on a given path

methods.name: _nodePathChanged
methods.description: Gets called if the selected node (path) has changed

params.name: path
params.description: The path of the newly selected node

methods.name: _showGlobalSearchBtn
methods.description: Returns true, if the button should be visible

params.name: searching
params.description: If a search is currently executed

methods.name: tryGlobalSearch
methods.description: Triggers a global search

methods.name: _computeSearching
methods.description: Returns true, if a search string is eligable to trigger a search

params.name: searchMinLength
params.description: The minimum length of value to be valid

return.desc: If a search should be triggered

methods.name: _renderSection
methods.description: Returns true, if the path of a node should be visible in the view

params.name: searching
params.description: If a search is currently executed

params.name: index
params.description: The node's current index in the list

return.desc: If the path should be visible

methods.name: _clickOnEnterOrSpace
methods.description:
Triggers a click event on the currentTarget
if space or enter key was pressed

methods.name: _computeRowClass
methods.description: Returns the classes of a row based its selection state

params.name: selected
params.description: If the row is currently selected

attributes.description: The main node structure

attributes.description: The currently displayed node list

attributes.name: selected-node
attributes.description: The selected node

attributes.name: node-path

The path of the selected node
This is the node which was highlighted and after the user tapped the select button

attributes.name: nodes-on-node-path
attributes.description: The nodes on the path of the selected node

attributes.name: highlighted-node

The highlighted (focused) node

elements.description:
`cosmoz-treenode-navigator`
Navigator through object with treelike datastructure.

properties.name: tree
properties.description: The main node structure

properties.name: selectedNode
properties.description: Currently selected node object

properties.name: noReset
properties.description: If true, reset button gets hidden

properties.name: searchPlaceholder
properties.description: Placeholder for the search field

properties.name: buttonTextPlaceholder
properties.description: Placeholder for button text

properties.name: nodePath
properties.description: The path of the selected node

properties.name: nodesOnNodePath
properties.description: The nodes on the path of the selected node

properties.name: searchGlobalPlaceholder
properties.description:
Text displayed when local search has finished
to suggest a search on the entire tree

properties.name: dialogText
properties.description: Settable text for dialog title.

properties.name: searchMinLength
properties.description:
Minimum length before an search
starts.

properties.name: highlightedNodePath
properties.description: Path string of highlighted (focused) node
